explanation: [0-0] In a room with blue walls and a checkered floor, a cartoon Spiderman and a cartoon Hulk are standing in front of a pile of cartoon yellow poop. Spiderman is on the left, hands on his hips, looking at the yellow poop on the floor. Hulk is on the right, lifting his left leg in the air above the yellow poop. On the blue wall hangs a framed picture of a red race car. The white text "@DJ Enmin" is written at the bottom of the screen.

[0-2] The cartoon Hulk then leans forward, slowly lowering his raised foot towards the cartoon yellow poop on the ground. The shot then cuts to the cartoon Hulk standing in the middle of the screen, raising his foot to step on the yellow poop on the ground. Spiderman is standing behind him, looking ahead. Behind them, on the left blue wall is a cabinet with a Rubik's Cube and a purple doll, and on the right blue wall hangs a framed photo of a city night scene.
